meta.title: Custom API Integrations
meta.description: This is Codex Software landing page

articleWithImageAndText.title: Solutions
articleWithImageAndText.text: We create efficient and secure connections between software solutions of any types, purpose and complexity.

textBoxes.title: HP Siteflow Connectors
textBoxes.subtitle: Get your software seamlessly connected with HP Siteflow platform

textBoxes.title: CRM API Integrations
textBoxes.subtitle: Connect your software with any modern CRM

textBoxes.title: Office365 API Integrations
textBoxes.subtitle: Create seamless connections between your software and Office

textBoxes.title: Logistics/3PL API Integrations
textBoxes.subtitle: Establish connections with 3PL and Logistics Software

textBoxes.title: Project Management Platform Integrations
textBoxes.subtitle: Build efficient connections with most popular Project Management platforms

textBoxes.title: eCommerce API Integrations
textBoxes.subtitle: Connect your store with major marketplaces and eCommerce apps

imageBoxes.title: HP Inc
imageBoxes.description: After the acquisition of OneFlow Systems’ platform, we continued to support HP Inc. in building the Siteflow platform and PrintOS infrastructure. Our specialists are also involved in other software projects and digital initiatives of the corporation.
imageBoxes.testimonial: “Codex have provided me with a great team for more than a decade. High quality engineers and managers that understand the dynamics of my business. I look forward to our relationship continuing”

imageBoxes.title: Analytium
imageBoxes.description: We've designed a Java-based RESTful API for a UK-based software consultancy working with SAS - a US-based analytical software powerhouse. The solution was developed as a complementary plugin to the existing software.
imageBoxes.testimonial: “I was impressed by the sheer amount of homework they did in the beginning. They were prepared to do a lot of research and learning before taking on the project. That's still very unique. A lot of other organizations don't step out of their comfort zone. Codex Software wasn't afraid of that.”

imageBoxes.title: AHAU260
imageBoxes.description: AHAU260 is a platform that boosts productivity by connecting tasks in popular project management platforms with documents, artworks, conversations, emails, and browser tabs.

imageBoxes.title: Customis3D
imageBoxes.description: We developed a print-on-demand dropshipping eCommerce app for Shopify, allowing store owners to sell various customizable print-on-demand products - from phone cases to yoga mats, towels, and blankets, - without any need for inventory, production, or logistics.
